bill_title: authorize the Board of Regents to accept and use easement proceeds for the purposes authorized by the 2022 Session Laws, chapter 198.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to authorize the Board of Regents to accept and use easement proceeds for the purposes authorized by the 2022 Session Laws, chapter 198. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. The Board of Regents may accept and use the proceeds from the grant of easements over or across the property located at the NE1/4NW1/4 of Section 34 and the S1/2SW1/4 of Section 27, all in Township 2 North, Range 8 East of the B.H.M, Pennington County, for the design, renovation, and construction of the addition for the health sciences center at Black Hills State University–Rapid City, authorized by the 2022 Session Laws, chapter 198. Section 2. Any proceeds received by the Board of Regents pursuant to section 1 of this Act shall be deposited into the special fund created by the 2022 Session Laws chapter 198, and expended in accordance with the provisions of that chapter.
